articles.summary: Investor's Business Daily: 2025 IPO Market Largest Since 2021, Thanks To These Unicorns. The year's 202 initial public offerings raised a combined $44 billion. IPO activity peaked during the summer, when Figma went public at 33 a share and closed the first day of trading at 115.50. It was a record first-day gain for a billion-dollar IPO. Related tickers mentioned: CRCL, FIG, KLAR, MDLN, STUB.
